title: Dashboard Dictionary for Counterfactual outputs
description: The original JSON format for counterfactual examples

cf_examples_list.description: The list of the computed counterfactual examples.

local_importance.description: The list of counterfactual local importance for the features in input data.

summary_importance.description: The list of counterfactual summary importance for the features in input data.

metadata.description: The metadata about the generated counterfactuals.
